Text.Language: Arip~recbeuin e~h~r/i e~jwn: w~ ten[oic n~n/b t/ren ]yeo~tokoc: Maria y~mau m~pencwt/r: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Intercede on our behalf, O Lady of us all the Theotokos, Mary the Mother of our Savior, that He may forgive us our sins.
